item.title: 3A Musical Workshop Series by The Creative Expression Ministry
item.description: Afro-Brazilian Samba Drums Workshop for Beginners. Latin Percussion Hand Drums Workshop for Outreach.

item.title: Wesley Prison Ministry & Wesley Befrienders To Older Persons Ministry Open House
item.description: Come with an open heart, hear how you can be blessed in journeying with prison inmates. WPM will share our hopes in journeying with our brothers from prison to their release and settling in to a Christian community.
item.content:encoded: Come with an open heart, hear how you can be blessed in journeying with prison inmates. WPM will share our hopes in journeying with our brothers from prison to their release and settling in to a Christian community.
item.dc:creator: Come with an open heart, hear how you can be blessed in journeying with prison inmates. WPM will share our hopes in journeying with our brothers from prison to their release and settling in to a Christian community.
